hero.headline: A 12-hour hackathon where ideas come to life.

about.title: What is Suceavathon?
about.description: Suceavathon is a 12-hour coding event where participants come together to turn ideas into reality through code, creativity, and collaboration. Whether you're a beginner or experienced in programming, you'll find a welcoming community ready to support you.
about.highlight: ‚ú® Created especially for beginners and first-time hackers! ‚ú®

infoBoxes.title: Newbie-friendly
infoBoxes.description: Never written code before? No worries! We‚Äôll have on-site mentors to help you get started, plus workshops designed specifically for beginners.

infoBoxes.title: Learn by doing
infoBoxes.description: Build your first hands-on project in a fun & friendly environment. Zero stress, 100% exploration!

infoBoxes.title: Do something extraordinary
infoBoxes.description: Form a team, choose a project, and you have 12 hours to build it. You‚Äôll be amazed at what you can accomplish in one day!

faq.question: Is the event physical?
faq.answer: Yes! Suceavathon is a physical event taking place at a location in Suceava.

faq.question: Is participation free?
faq.answer: Yes, participation is completely free! We provide food, drinks, materials, and much more.

faq.question: Can I participate if I don't have a team?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You can come solo and form a team on-site during our team matching session.

faq.question: How many people can be in a team?
faq.answer: Teams can have between 1 and 5 members, but we highly recommend forming a team via team matching for a more collaborative and fun experience!

faq.question: Will there be prizes?
faq.answer: Yes! The best projects will be awarded by a jury. We also have special prizes and surprises for participants.

faq.question: Can I participate if I‚Äôm a programming beginner?
faq.answer: Absolutely! The event is designed for all skill levels. We‚Äôll have mentors and beginner-friendly workshops.

faq.question: Where should I go and what time?
faq.answer: You‚Äôll receive all details via email before the event‚Äîincluding on Slack, Discord, WhatsApp, and other channels. The exact location and time will be clearly communicated.

faq.question: Can I participate if I‚Äôm not a high school student?
faq.answer: Yes, middle school students can participate! However, we do not accept high school graduates or college students. If you still want to be part of the event, contact us about volunteering.

schedule.details: Presentation of rules and team formation
The clock starts! You have 12 hours to build your project
An interactive workshop for those who want to learn the basics
Capture The Flag challenge for all security enthusiasts
Snacks and energizers for the final sprint
Each team presents their project to the jury

transport.title: Transport
transport.description: Armeneasca Tower is located in the center of Suceava, just a few minutes‚Äô walk from the main public transport. Lines: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, 15, 17, 21, 22, 23, 26, 28, 29, 30
transport.guidanceDescription: We can guide participants from the station or other arrival points to the event location if needed.

contact.description: Have questions or want to learn more about Suceavathon? Send us a message and we‚Äôll get back to you as soon as possible.
